00009 static void DLL_CALLCONV
00010 TestFreeImageAlgorithms_IO(CuTest* tc)
00011 {
00012         FIBITMAP *dib1, *dib2;
00013         FREE_IMAGE_TYPE type;
00014         int bpp, err;
00015 
00016         dib1 = FreeImageAlgorithms_LoadFIBFromFile(IMAGE_DIR "\\colour_lines.png");
00017 
00018         CuAssertTrue(tc, dib1 != NULL);
00019 
00020         bpp = FreeImage_GetBPP(dib1);
00021         type = FreeImage_GetImageType(dib1);
00022 
00023         CuAssertTrue(tc, bpp == 24);
00024         CuAssertTrue(tc, type == FIT_BITMAP);
00025         
00026         err = FreeImageAlgorithms_SaveFIBToFile (dib1, TEMP_DIR "\\colour_lines_test.bmp", BIT8);
00027 
00028         CuAssertTrue(tc, err == FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SUCCESS);
00029 
00030         dib2 = FreeImageAlgorithms_LoadFIBFromFile(TEMP_DIR "\\colour_lines_test.bmp");
00031 
00032         err = FreeImageAlgorithms_BitwiseCompare(dib1, dib2);
00033 
00034         FreeImage_Unload(dib1);
00035         FreeImage_Unload(dib2);
00036 }

00042 {

00044 
00045         SUITE_ADD_TEST(suite, TestFreeImageAlgorithms_IO);
